snippet.title: Wollongong's Vintage Ball for Doris raising dollars for dog rescue
snippet.content:
Wollongong's Vintage Ball for Doris raising dollars for dog rescue
Jude Felton and Bethany McCarthy ahead of the Vintage Ball for Doris. The 2017 theme is "Vintage Glamour". Picture: Greg Totman
Joanne Teunissen modelling a vintage ball gown. The 2017 theme for the ball is "Vintage Glamour". Picture: Tale Thief Photography
FLASHBACK: 2016 Vintage Ball for Doris. Margot Hawketts and Catherine Wallace. Picture: Adam McLean
FLASHBACK: 2016 Vintage Ball for Doris. Shona Sim, Dan McGrath and Catriona Loncar at The Illawarra Master Builders Club for the Vintage Ball for Doris.Picture: Adam McLean
FLASHBACK: 2016 Jenny Cook, Clair Langford and Julia Quilter at The Illawarra Master Builders Club for the Vintage Ball for Doris. Picture: Adam McLean
FLASHBACK: 2016 Anne Schoo and Virginia Adams at the Vintage Ball for Doris at the Master Builders Club. Picture: Adam McLean
FLASHBACK: 2016 Cindy Blaney and Maria Beukers at The Illawarra Master Builders Club for the Vintage Ball for Doris. Picture: Adam McLean
FLASHBACK: 2016 Marina Mendola, John De Carli, Ian Epstein and Debbie Mandelbaun at The Illawarra Master Builders Club for the Vintage Ball for Doris. Picture: Adam McLean
FLASHBACK: 2016 Honora Jenkins limbos at The Illawarra Master Builders Club during the Vintage Ball for Doris. Picture: Adam McLean
FLASHBACK: 2016 Mark Melhuish pining the sunnies on Doris at The Illawarra Master Builders Club for the Vintage Ball for Doris. Picture: Adam McLean
FLASHBACK: 2016 .Riannan Jurriaans plays poo pong at The Illawarra Master Builders Club for the Vintage Ball for Doris. Picture: Adam McLean
FLASHBACK: 2016 Leah Wills playing poo pong at The Illawarra Master Builders Club for the Vintage Ball for Doris. Picture: Adam McLean
FLASHBACK: 2015 Kim Capp, Trevor Annetts and Helen Melhuish at the Vintage Ball for Doris at the Master Builders Club. Picture: Adam McLean
FLASHBACK: 2015 Jude Felton, Melissa Coros, dog Debi, Gaz Crooke at the Vintage Ball for Doris at the Master Builders Club. Picture: Adam McLean
FLASHBACK TO 2014: Alison Campbell, Heather Tedstone, Chris Van Der Zypen and Carinya Barkley at The second annual Vintage Ball for Doris at Illawarra Master Builders. Picture: Christopher Chan
FLASHBACK TO 2014: Donna Shuttleworth, Allison Budge Amy Robson and Emilee Della-Libera at The second annual Vintage Ball for Doris at Illawarra Master Builders. Picture: Christopher Chan
FLASHBACK TO 2014: Jessica Thompson and Tamara Perry at The second annual Vintage Ball for Doris at Illawarra Master Builders. Picture: Christopher Chan
FLASHBACK TO 2014: Peter Felton, Belle Bringing, Jude Felton and Bethany McCarthy with dog Debi at The second annual Vintage Ball for Doris at Illawarra Master Builders. Picture: Christopher Chan
exit
Now in its fifth year the Vintage Ball for Doris returns for another year on August 26 at The Builders Club, Church Street in Wollongong. The main aim of the ball is to give the community an opportunity to dress up in old world glamour whilst raising money and awareness for dog rescue. "Last year we raised over $15,000 so hopefully we'll raise more than that this year," organiser Jude Felton said, who expects the event to sell-out soon.
Joanne Teunissen modelling a vintage ball gown. Picture: Tale Thief Photography
Tickets include champagne, canapes, main meal, dessert and entertainment - including Sara Jeanne and the City Gents plus a fashion parade. Since its inception the ball has raised $40,671 for animal welfare - including the Wollongong Animal Rescue Network, Oscar's Law and the NSW Bull Terrier Rescue.
For tickets or more information visit:
